text:
RT @KaylaEpstein: Rep. Jayapal told me "it's absolutely outrageous" that Gohmert usually opted out of masks and said members had a duty to keep each other safe.

"The science is clear," she said. "Wear a mask. Wear a damn mask." https://t.co/uW9kK1eRp0
